{"id":424647047,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1606486621,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/424647047/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int l,r;\n        sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());\n        vector<vector<int> > ans;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-2;i++){\n            l=i+1;\n            r=nums.size()-1;\n            while(l<r){\n                if(nums[i]+nums[l]+nums[r]>0){\n                    r--;\n                }\n                else if(nums[i]+nums[l]+nums[r]<0){\n                    l++;\n                }\n                else{\n                    ans.push_back(vector<int>());\n                    ans[ans.size()-1].push_back(nums[i]);\n                    ans[ans.size()-1].push_back(nums[l]);\n                    ans[ans.size()-1].push_back(nums[r]);\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum"}
